Html:
Hi!

I have this project in windows mobile 6.5, I'm using the GMap.NET to use maps in the application.
When i try to debug to see if it works, the system starts "thinking" and nothing else happens. It doens't send me an exception or something... it just keeps "thinking". When i stop the project, it says "the ##.exe is unstable" and i have to close the project.

Any idea what can be happening?
build, deploy, debug/run, check output log
